text: Mrakovo () is a rural locality (a selo) and the administrative center of Mrakovsky Selsoviet, Gafuriysky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 634 as of 2010. There are 14 streets. == Geography == It is located 30 km from Krasnousolsky. == References == Category:Rural localities in Gafuriysky District
title: Mrakovo, Gafuriysky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
